name: BEASLEY INDUSTRIES, INC., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ., would reverse the Order of the Commonwealth Court.
parties: BEASLEY INDUSTRIES, INC., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order of Commonwealth Court affirmed.
LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ., would reverse the Order of the Commonwealth Court.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert L. Weldon, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Bryan E. Barbin, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
557 A.2d 1062
BEASLEY INDUSTRIES, INC., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 2, 1989.
Decided May 10, 1989.
Robert L. Weldon, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Bryan E. Barbin, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
